tagline: The AI that actually does things.
description: Clears your inbox, sends emails, manages your calendar, checks you in for flights. All from WhatsApp, Telegram, or any chat app you already use.
feature_machine_desc: Mac, Windows, or Linux. Anthropic, OpenAI, or local models. Private by default‚Äîyour data stays yours.
feature_chat_desc: Talk to it on WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, or iMessage. Works in DMs and group chats.
feature_memory_desc: Remembers you and becomes uniquely yours. Your preferences, your context, your AI.
feature_browser_desc: It can browse the web, fill forms, and extract data from any site.
feature_system_desc: Read and write files, run shell commands, execute scripts. Full access or sandboxed‚Äîyour choice.
feature_skills_desc: Extend with community skills or build your own. It can even write its own.
newsletter_desc: Get updates on new features, integrations, and lobster wisdom. No spam, unsubscribe anytime.
integrations_hero_desc:
50+ integrations with the apps and services you already use.
Chat from your phone, control from your desktop, automate everything.
integrations_chat_desc: Message Moltbot from any chat app ‚Äî it responds right where you are.
integrations_models_desc: Use any model you want ‚Äî cloud or local. Your keys, your choice.
integrations_productivity_desc: Notes, tasks, wikis, and code ‚Äî Moltbot works with your favorite tools.
integrations_music_desc: Control playback, identify songs, and manage multi-room audio.
integrations_smarthome_desc: Lights, thermostats, and IoT devices ‚Äî all voice-controllable.
integrations_tools_desc: Browser control, scheduled tasks, email triggers, and more.
integrations_media_desc: Generate images, capture screens, and find the perfect GIF.
integrations_social_desc: Post tweets, manage email, and stay connected.
integrations_platforms_desc: Run the Gateway anywhere. Use companion apps for voice, camera, and native features.
integrations_platforms_mobile: Mobile access: Chat via WhatsApp/Telegram from your phone ‚Äî no app install needed.
integrations_showcase_desc: Impressive integrations built by the community.
integrations_cta_desc: Install Moltbot and connect your first provider in minutes.
integrations_clawdhub_desc: Discover 100+ community-built skills on ClawdHub ‚Äî the public registry for sharing and discovering agent capabilities.
shoutouts_subtitle: What the community is saying about Moltbot
showcase_subtitle: Real projects, real automation, real magic.
showcase_cta_desc: Share your Moltbot creation with the community
